DOC.brief_summary: To establish a clinic based case control study for examination of potential risk factors for primary adult brain tumors.
DOC.brief_title: Genetic Epidemiology of Adult Onset Glioma
DOC.detailed_description: Genetic epidemiology of adult glioma to establish potential risk factors for primary adult brain tumors.
DOC.criteria: primary glioma of any stage diagnosed within 4 months
